user.title: EnerSync – SalzburgAG Smart Meter Importer
user.description: Configuration for CSV → Home Assistant Smart-Meter Import

user.title: EnerSync Settings
user.description: Tune CSV parsing and import behaviour

input_dir.name: CSV Input Directory
input_dir.description: Folder where CSV files are placed for import.

processed_dir.name: Processed CSV Directory
processed_dir.description: CSV files will be moved here after import.

error_dir.name: Error Directory
error_dir.description: CSV files that fail to import will be moved here.

csv_glob.name: CSV Filename Pattern
csv_glob.description: File mask for CSV files to import. Default: *.csv

csv_sep.name: Column Separator
csv_sep.description: Set a separator (e.g., ; or ,) or use auto-detect.

csv_decimal.name: Decimal Separator
csv_decimal.description: "auto" detects automatically. Set "." or "," manually if needed.

csv_dayfirst.name: European Date Format
csv_dayfirst.description: Enable if your CSV uses DD.MM.YYYY format.

csv_datetime_col.name: Timestamp Column Name
csv_datetime_col.description: Column with date/time values. Leave empty to auto-detect.

csv_value_col.name: Energy Value Column
csv_value_col.description: Column with energy usage values (kWh). Leave empty to auto-detect.

csv_valid_status_regex.name: Valid Status Regex
csv_valid_status_regex.description: Rows must match this regex to be used. Leave blank to accept all.

dedup.name: Duplicate Handling
dedup.description: If multiple records exist for same timestamp, choose how to combine.

anchor_kwh.name: Meter Calibration (kWh)
anchor_kwh.description: Known real meter reading to align CSV data.

anchor_datetime.name: Calibration Timestamp
anchor_datetime.description: Date/time of the real meter reading above.

ha_token.name: Home Assistant Token
ha_token.description: Long-lived access token from HA user profile.

statistic_id.name: Home Assistant Statistic ID
statistic_id.description: Statistic entity to write data into.

batch_size.name: Upload Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of records uploaded per batch.

scan_interval_seconds.name: Scan Interval
scan_interval_seconds.description: How often to check for new CSVs.

reset_watermark.name: Reset Import Watermark
reset_watermark.description: Force re-import from earliest timestamp on next run.
